In a world where horses are the dominant species, a young horse named Thunder is born with striking zebra stripes. This unique feature makes him an outcast among his peers, who view him as a freak of nature. However, Thunder's zebra stripes hold a special secret: they grant him the ability to communicate with animals of all kinds. As he embarks on a journey to discover the truth about his stripes, Thunder befriends a wise old owl, a mischievous raccoon, and a kind-hearted deer, who join him on a quest to uncover the mysteries of the animal kingdom.

In a post-apocalyptic future, the world has been ravaged by a catastrophic event that has wiped out most of the planet's animal population. Amidst the ruins, a lone horse named Starlight roams the desolate landscape, searching for a way to restore the natural balance. She discovers that her zebra stripes hold the key to unlocking a powerful technology that can revive the extinct species. With the help of a ragtag group of survivors, Starlight must navigate treacherous landscapes and battle against ruthless scavengers to reach the fabled "Eclipse," a hidden sanctuary where the secrets of the animal kingdom await.

In a mystical realm, the Horse with Zebra Stripes is a legendary creature said to possess the power to heal any wound. A young apprentice named Kaito seeks out the horse's guidance, hoping to learn the ancient art of healing. As he journeys through the mystical realm, Kaito encounters a cast of characters, each with their own unique abilities and motivations. Together, they embark on a perilous quest to defeat the dark forces threatening the realm and unlock the secrets of the Horse's zebra stripes.

In a world where animals have evolved to live alongside humans, a horse named Thunder is born with zebra stripes that grant him the ability to shape-shift into any animal he desires. As he explores the city, Thunder discovers a hidden underground world of animal gangs, each with their own agendas and rivalries. With the help of a street-smart raccoon and a rebellious deer, Thunder must navigate the complex web of alliances and rivalries to uncover the truth about his stripes and the secrets of the animal kingdom.
